Episodes.Title: Built to Kill (1)
Episodes.Plot: In part one of this two-part seventh season opener Grissom and Catherine handle the case of a women's dead body found at Cirque du Soleil by a performer. An investor at one of Sam Braun's new casinos is shot to death during a party on the rooftop. Catherine's life is in jeopardy after visiting a nightclub with Nick. Grissom finds a miniature replica of a crime scene that he is investigating.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Scott Wilson, Kevin Rahm, Joe Reegan, Michael Milhoan, John Mayer, Arielle Vandenberg, Danny Bonaduce, Yusef Gatewood, David Berman, Edward C. Hayes, Nick Searcy, Mark Ivanir

Episodes.Title: Built to Kill (2)
Episodes.Plot: Grissom investigates the murder of an aging rockstar who is found dead in his kitchen with an exact replica of the crime scene on the counter next to him. Catherine probes her own abduction and learns that someone may be targeting her family.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Adrian R'Mante, Scott Subiono, Michael Milhoan, Kevin Rahm, Monica Keena, Brianne Davis, Alden Caleb Ehrenreich, Kay Panabaker, Scott Wilson, Sean Young, Danny Bonaduce

Episodes.Title: Toe Tags
Episodes.Plot: Coming straight from the perspectives of five people: Donna, Rebecca, Jack, Lou and Ray. All with one thing in common. They?re all dead. Brass and Catherine get to handle the case of Donna, who?s a cop from San Francisco, moonlighting as a bodyguard. Warrick and Greg work the case of Rebecca. Nick and Sofia handle the case of Jack, a returning veteran from Iraq. Grissom and Sara take the case of Lou and Ray whose bodies were found in Lou?s garage.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Anne Bedian, Andrew Welsh, Becky Stockton, Brenda Canela, Paula Jai Parker, Alexondra Lee, Kevin E. West, Jessica Steen, Troy Ruptash, Jim Parrack, Markus Flanagan, Amanda Fuller, Archie Kao, David Eigenberg, Kevi

Episodes.Title: Fannysmackin'
Episodes.Plot: Three tourists are beat up, badly. One is dead, Alfonzo. Jessica is badly beaten but is still alive. Stanley, the last tourist is saved by Greg who ends up severely hurt in turn and ends up hospitalized after having to make a life altering decision.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Kevin Federline, Dov Tiefenbach, Daniel Franzese, Lorraine Toussaint, Vicellous Shannon, Siera Casey, Alyssa Nichols, Willie McMiller, Vicki Davis, Tom Ayers, Seidy Lopez, Jim Beaver, Victoria Recano, Brendan Mic

Episodes.Title: Double-Cross
Episodes.Plot: Grissom and Sara may be secret lovers, but they still find ways to surprise each other like when their religious beliefs surface when two nuns find a body of a woman crucified on a makeshift cross. The woman was found in a church where the priest may be a man of sin instead of a man of God.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tim Guinee, Tyler King, Olivia Leigh, Zach Bostrom, Janelle Giumarra, John Lee Ames, Kendall Clement, Blake Lindsley, Waylon Payne, Lorna Raver, Meredith Monroe, Sean Patrick Flanery, Janelle Marra

Episodes.Title: Burn Out
Episodes.Plot: Grissom attempts to get a confession from a neighborhood pedophile by having him help in locating two missing boys.  The sex offender is the main suspect.  The investigation is more complex than the team ever thought it would be.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paula Francis, Paul Ganus, Terry Bozeman, Palmer Davis, Glenn Taranto, Ingrid Oliu-Ostrom, Brittany Ishibashi, David Ramsey, Valerie Mikita, Clifton Powell, Drew Matthews, Seth Peterson, Ridge Canipe, Betsy Brand

Episodes.Title: Post Mortem
Episodes.Plot: While investigating an elderly woman's murder, Grissom receives a miniature crime scene replica; Greg attends a hearing to ascertain his culpability in a teenager's accidental death.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Carla Jimenez, Kenneth Choi, DJ Qualls, Leanza Cornett, Vicellous Shannon, Lorraine Toussaint, Michael Bofshever, Randall Arney, Jim Beaver, Amy Aquino, Juliana Bellinger, Omar Leyva, Mati Moralejo

Episodes.Title: Happenstance
Episodes.Plot: Identical twins are found murdered on the same night.  The CSI?s investigate the two separate murders only to find a twist in the investigation find that leads them in another new direction.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Valerie Mahaffey, Saige Thompson, Sarai Givaty, Harry Van Gorkum, Joanna Going, J.C. MacKenzie, Kelly Smith, Frank Grillo, Maxwell Huckabee, Joanna Going, Sheeri Rappaport

Episodes.Title: Living Legend
Episodes.Plot: The Cadillac of an infamous 1970?s mob boss turns up in a lake, even though he disappeared years ago. A photo of current murder victims also turns up in the car, so the team must determine whether this current murder spree is related to the missing gangster.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Roger Daltrey, Jesse Jensen, Mark Elias, Jeff Howard, Amy Scott, Rik Young, Clark Middleton, Kristin Minter, Griff Furst, Tangie Ambrose, Ion Overman, J. Omar Castro, Louis Giambalvo, Bob McCracken, Barbara Bain, B

Episodes.Title: Loco Motives
Episodes.Plot: Grissom investigates when a worker at a poultry processing plant is found dead in a stun bath used to electrocute chickens before they are slaughtered. Nearby, a miniature replica of the crime scene is discovered. It's eerily similar to two other replicas left at scenes of homicides. Also, a man and a dead woman are found stuck in cement at a construction site; and an elderly Russian woman is discovered dead in her apartment with her head in a gas stove, but Warrick thinks she was murdered.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Kendall Carly Browne, Dayton Callie, Greg Brown, Carla Orlandi, Parker Goris, Lilyan Chauvin, Joleen Lutz, Nelson Pena, Michael Rispoli, Becky Wahlstrom, Lexi Jourden, E.J. Callahan, Danny Bonaduce, Matt Malloy

Episodes.Title: Leaving Las Vegas
Episodes.Plot: Catherine testifies in a murder trial in which a man is accused of murdering his own mother three years ago, but the suspect is found not guilty. Catherine, however, believes he did commit the crime and that he may also have killed two other people, so she sets out to find the other victims. Grissom prepares to leave on a four-week sabbatical.
Episodes.GuestStars: Trenton Rogers, Skyler Gisando, Vincent Duvall, Ian Gilmore, Pat Destro, Virginia Newcomb, Kevin Rankin, Michael C. Alexander, Lucinda Jenney, Michael Sean Tighe, Anne-Marie Johnson, Ted Heyck, Jed Rees, Danielle

Episodes.Title: Sweet Jane
Episodes.Plot: The team has a hard time trying to understand Michael who has become a team member since Grissom?s teaching hiatus.  They investigate the murder of an unidentified girl who may have been killed by a serial killer who has been killing since the early 1970?s.
Episodes.GuestStars: Pat Crawford Brown, R.C. Bates, Sandy Martin, Jonathan Walker Spencer, Tom Wright, Chris Bauer, Laura Leigh Hughes, Vince Grant Ned Beatty, Kay Panabaker, Liev Schreiber

Episodes.Title: Redrum
Episodes.Plot: At Keppler's request Catherine uses a different approach to catch the killer, and in doing so she deceives the rest of the CSI team.  The team soon discovers that something is amiss in Catherine?s investigation.
Episodes.GuestStars: Gill Gayle, Darris Love, Adam Nee, Conor O'Farrell, Gerald McCullouch, Geno Monteiro, Suzy Cot, Jernard Burks, Liev Schreiber, David Fabrizio

Episodes.Title: Meet Market
Episodes.Plot: Nick and Keppler investigate the bizarre world of the black market sales of body parts after they find a body that has been burned and the organs removed.  The rest of the CSI team investigates the death of rich woman who was killed in her own home.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kayla Mae Maloney, Douglas Sills, Michael Weaver, Tymberlee Chanel, Ivan Shawn, Jason Olive, Joy Bisco, Jo Anderson, Robin Thomas, John Toles-Bey, John Hensley, Gordon Clapp, Liev Schreiber

Episodes.Title: Law of Gravity
Episodes.Plot: Grissom returns from his sabbatical; Keppler is put into a compromising position when the bodies of a Trenton police officer and a hooker are found in a hotel room. The man who found them is a retired New Jersey cop and close friend to Keppler, who doesn't reveal their relationship.
Episodes.GuestStars: Toy Connor, Kayla Mae Maloney, James Hiroyuki Liao, Shacolby Randell, Len Cariou, Larry Mitchell, Jared Krikac, Liz Vassey, Liev Schreiber, John Everlove

Episodes.Title: Monster In the Box
Episodes.Plot: Once he unseals a package sent to him through the mail, Grissom is floored when he finds a miniature crime scene inside. The finding is entirely more perplexing since the successive killer accountable for earlier related miniature crimes is now deceased. Grissom plows to examine the miniature and discover the actual location, when the investigation makes it clear the murder showed has yet to happen, but is probably going to happen soon.
Episodes.GuestStars: Janine Sharel, Brendan Fletcher, Harry Groener, Scot Wilson, Cate Cohen, Tim Trobec, Kathleen Quinlan, Dayton Callie

Episodes.Title: Fallen Idols
Episodes.Plot: Grissom and his team are discouraged when they find a pool of blood as they begin investigating the disappearance of a high school basketball star and his cheerleader girlfriend. Grissom's quip that the young lovers may have run off to Mexico is soon quashed by the discovery of drops of blood by Ryan's vacant parking spot at the school. After finding a letterman jacket and cheerleading sweater in the field house and a pool of Ryan's blood nearby, the team tries to determine what went awry.
Episodes.GuestStars: Matt Roth, Todd Allen, Timi Prulhiere, Valarie Pettiford, Reiley McClendon, Lyndsy Fonseca, Matt Lanter, Yaani King, Laura Harris, Bridget Ann White, Larry Mitchell, Liz Vassey

Episodes.Title: Empty Eyes
Episodes.Plot: The terrified eyes and cryptic words of a murder victim haunt Sara while she processes the house where several showgirls were killed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mykel Shannon Jenkins, Matt Thompson, Tiffany DuPont, Walton Goggins, Marshall Allman, Ruby Dee, Sheeri Rappaport, Larry Mitchell, Charlie Weber, Kellan Lutz, Nadine Heimann, Betsy Rue, Robert Gant

Episodes.Title: Big Shots
Episodes.Plot: After a man is killed in his limousine, Greg finds that the murder victim has ties to the man he had to kill in self-defense.  The team finds that the brother is involved in this investigation and has to deal with him and his hostile mother.
Episodes.GuestStars: Larry Mitchell, Bobby Hall, Jon Farless, Dheeaba Donghrer, Ari Zagaris, Ben Crowley, Aimee Garcia, Marlene Fort, Alicia Sixtos, Charley Rossman, Katie R. Chonacas, Robin Sydney, Laura Vandervoort, Victoria Presco

Episodes.Title: Lab Rats
Episodes.Plot: The CSI labrats take center stage to discuss the case of the Miniature Killer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Wallace Langham, Archie Kao, Liz Vassey, Sheeri Rappaport, Jon Wellner

Episodes.Title: Ending Happy
Episodes.Plot: When a has-been boxer is killed, the CSIs must establish which of several life-threatening acts actually killed him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Wallace Langham, Peter Stormare, Kurt Fuller, Luis Antonio Ramos, Vince Vieluf, Wendy Makkena, Ashley Johnson, Marnette Patterson, David Berman, James Whitmore

Episodes.Title: Leapin' Lizards
Episodes.Plot: Several suspects in a murder case are UFO-club members who believe shape-shifting aliens have been working to conquer the human race for centuries.
Episodes.GuestStars: Wallace Langham, Ally Sheedy

Episodes.Title: The Good, the Bad, and the Dominatrix
Episodes.Plot: Grissom investigates when a sadistic client tries to murder Lady Heather (Melinda Clarke), who makes the probe more difficult when she refuses to name her attacker. Also, Grissom's reunion with Lady Heather makes Sara uneasy.
Episodes.GuestStars: Wallace Langham, Melinda Clarke

Episodes.Title: Living Doll (1)
Episodes.Plot: As the CSI's continue their search for and discover the identity of the "Miniature Killer", Grissom and Sara's relationship gets exposed to the rest of the team as she goes missing during the investigation. The 'Miniature Killer' is finally captured, but not before a member of CSI becomes the killer's final victim.
Episodes.GuestStars: Wallace Langham, Jessica Collins
